name: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Digital Forensics

Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Di: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Digital Forensics The Certificate of Undergraduate Study (CUGS) in Digital Forensics is designed to offer students the opportunity of a specialized study to provide students with experience in key courses of this discipline at the undergraduate level. This CUGS prepares students to sit for the following certification exams: EC Council: Digital Forensics Essentials EnCASE Certified Examiner EC Council: ECIH - Certified Incident Hacker EC Council: CHFI - Certified Hacking Forensics Investigator

notes: Required Courses: 12 s.h. Students seeking this CUGS are required to successfully complete (grade of D- or better) the four courses in the order listed below:
Total Required Credits for the Program: 12 s.h. Fred Stinchcombe Advisor Robinson Hall 328I 856.256.4805 stinchcombe@rowan.edu
